mapper.insert: insert into Member(member_no, member_mid, member_name, member_email, member_department, member_team, member_phoneNumber, member_roadAddress,member_jibunAddress) values(seq_member_no.nextval, #{member_mid}, #{member_name}, #{member_email}, #{member_department}, #{member_team}, #{member_phoneNumber},#{member_roadAddress}, #{member_jibunAddress})
